localize.text: One day, a question occurred to me. Where did we come from? We were born and left in the world against our will.
They eventually bounded in life. We were only to throw out despair and anger.
We will understand life and soul through our hands.
Let's make a stronger fire in a life like a candle that will someday end.
We march every time and share our joy.
We draws the bump of life and life, the harmony of the flesh, and the more beautiful appearance.
Only weak actions were heard to us, and we sought mercy and love for them.
We can not understand them, nor will they understand us.
We ate endlessly to live. Inevitable depletion, garbage...
Getting to know its taste was an unavoidable process.
We were able to live. We could continue eating.
To understand what is beyond comprehension, They see and dreaming.
They have not paid for understanding. Just do it.
The tower is touched by the sky, and nothing will remain on the ground.
Who pays for the pain and the price of deeds given in our life.
Abandon the old body and become all one, and continues the red carnvial constantly.
Someday everyone will know, and tomorrow we will march together.
They set up a far high tower to go where they came.
There was no answer. They did not get what they wanted. They saw only the death of life.
They fought to eat each other.
And stronger side survived, that's the only story.
When the night falls in the Backstreet, they will come.
When the sun rise up, there will be no remains anymore.
We tried to accept it endlessly. We wanted to understand them in our head whatever the consequences.
In order not to collapse oneself. Because what they can't understand and what they can't reach is not acceptable...
From minor chores to murder by contract, they do anything you want once they have paycheck.
They are usually hired to the office, the syndicate, and the wings. Their works range from mere chores to something sublime.
They search endlessly. Patron by the Wings, Inventions from the backstreet, Loots from the Outskirt, Artifacts from the Ruins…
They just overcome whatever’s in front of them, with their weapons in hands, just as they’ve done for a long time.
The colossal tower of light is called The Library. It is natural for Fixers to be drawn to such a mystical place of life and death.
Book Hunters, who will rummage through the library ruled by Pale Librarian someday, are former Fixers.
They handle the secrets of the world. That is the privilege and absolute power of the Head, the Eye, and the Claw.
None can stand against them. The story of the Nest will never end if they exist.
